results.name: I'm Being Chased by a Bear
Inter-Space Operation: Journey to the Earth

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: min. Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 180 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
